title: Poro skin disappeared
body: I had a poro skin that I had unlocked through hextech chest.  This past weekend was the event and it was no longer equipped and the option for a skin is no longer available during select a champ.  Please help!  It was the project poro skin.

replies.body:
Since this is an account-specific question, we'll have to address it in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), where we can provide additional context.

Let me know if you encounter issues submitting that ticket.
